values.name: green
values.description: The KYC information is marked as green because this worker has a valid NID in the RSSB our database.

values.name: green
values.description: This worker phone number is marked as green because this phone number is registered under a worker after checking the phone number registered on his National ID, and it is valid to receive money through MOMO.

values.name: blue
values.description: This phone number is marked as blue because we have not verified the worker's KYC with RSSB, but the phone number is capable of receiving money.

two.description: This phone number is marked as red because it does not match any of the worker's phone numbers in RSSB.
This phone number is marked as red because it can't receive money
